name: Nature Toxin
description:
covers your weapon with a Nature Toxin so attacks have a chance to afflict targets with Severe Corruption.

When used together with Diffusion against an enemy afflicted with Severe Corruption, instantly deals 33 - 49 + 41% Weapon Damage to that enemy, and additional nearby enemies gain Severe Corruption with the number of enemies and radius scaling with Pips spent:

1 Pip: 1 additional target within 5m 
2 Pips: 2 additional targets within 5.5m 
3 Pips: 3 additional targets within 6m  
4 Pips: 4 additional targets within 6.5m  
5 Pips: 5 additional targets within 7m

Only 1 Toxin can be equipped at a time.
